["DescriptionNareel Island is a Plot Sales Development exclusively reserved for UAE Nationals.
Government Landmarks: Presidential Palace, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Central Bank, Federal National Council, ADNOC Headquarters
Located off the Capital's coast in Al Bateen, Nareel invites the UAE's elite to create a personal legacy through a unique opportunity to purchase land and build a home for generations to come.
Nareel will be home to a tranquil yet active neighbourhood with a swimming lagoon, club house and open parks across the Island. It will further benefit from private beaches, pontoons, gardens and driveways creating an exclusive living experience for UAE families within a gated community. 
With 148 plots on the island, Nareel will truly be a limited opportunity reserved for a few UAE Nationals only.
Soufi Scape Properties LLC was established on June 15, 2008 in Abu Dhabi, UAE. We specialize in the sale and leasing of residential property in UAE. As we listen to your preferences, and your particular needs, we only recommend properties, that best suit your financial capabilities and desires. Our aim is to use our 11 years of experience to help you make the best decisions in terms of purchasing and leasing of properties. Our company has been dealing with numbers of well-known developers. We are committed to value our investors, and provide excellent service at all times.
